name: Poltergoats
description:
Theme: Robomowing Ghost Goats for Shenanijam

You've decided its time to upgrade your farm. Done are the old natural goats, you've upgraded to cyber goats! But there's a problem, the ghost of the old goats you carelessly threw away are trying to wreck your cyber goats. Fling holy water at the possessed cyber goats and successfully mow your lawn!

Best Played Fullscreen.   Escape to quit windows version. Check us out at OverHook Games
